mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, type, process_mode, picture, video, goods_desc, price, up_shelf, up_time, stock, business, produce_time, pack_time, country, region, city
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, goods_name, type, process_mode, picture, video, goods_desc, price, up_shelf, up_time, stock, business, produce_time, pack_time, country, region, city) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{upShelf,jdbcType=BIT}, #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{business,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{produceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{packTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
